name: cursor-usage-stats
description: Monitor Cursor's included request usage and on-demand spending directly in the status bar with configurable threshold alerts.
author: Numan <ahmetnuman95@hotmail.com>

scripts.lint: yarn typecheck && yarn eslint && yarn prettier
scripts.lint:fix: yarn typecheck && yarn eslint:fix && yarn prettier:fix
scripts.pretest: rm -rf out && yarn build && yarn mock generate && tsc -p . --outDir out

cursorUsageStats.notifyOnStartup.description: Show a notification with current usage when the extension loads.

cursorUsageStats.pollIntervalSeconds.description: How often to fetch usage data in seconds.

cursorUsageStats.statusBar.displayMode.description: What to display in the status bar: 'both' shows requests and on-demand, 'requests' shows only request count, 'onDemand' shows only spending.

cursorUsageStats.statusBar.primaryMetric.description: Which metric determines the status bar color and notification severity.

cursorUsageStats.api.includedRequestMode.description: The model key in Cursor's /api/usage response for included requests. Falls back to auto-detecting a key with numRequestsTotal and maxRequestUsage if not found.

cursorUsageStats.alerts.includedRequestU.description: Usage percentages that trigger warning alerts for included requests. Use an empty array to disable.
Usage percentages that trigger critical alerts for included requests. Use an empty array to disable.

cursorUsageStats.alerts.onDemandUsage.wa.description: Usage percentages that trigger warning alerts for on-demand spending. Use an empty array to disable.

cursorUsageStats.alerts.onDemandUsage.cr.description: Usage percentages that trigger critical alerts for on-demand spending. Use an empty array to disable.
